# Note: the requirements here should use the same versions as in the ../lake/requirements.txt file, since the
#       "make docker_base-base" build-target will install the sesamclient package from pypi, and we don't
#       want version-conflicts.
idna==2.7
appdirs==1.4.3
ijson==2.3
python-dateutil==2.5.3
pyyaml==3.13
requests==2.23.0
nose==1.3.7
requests_oauthlib==0.8.0
oauthlib==2.1.0
